Dissapointment
01 Dec 2014 By SM Khan On flipkart.com

Apple has not upgraded one of its best products i.e. iPad Mini 2.nThis slate has the same specs as iPad Mini 2 with just an additional gold color and fingerprint sensor.nIt has the same last year's CPU, GPU, RAM, Display, etc.nnLooks like its a shameful stunt to fool customers into spending a few hundred dollars, buying the bigger iPad Air.nnWaste of money when you can get the same iPad Mini2 cheaper.

Seriously Disappointed with the specs!!!
06 Dec 2014 By Sahil Rao On flipkart.com

I m not at all satisfied with the specs of this version of iPad, its like paying about $100 extra for the same iPad (as of iPad mini 2) with a not very useful touch id and a golden colour, I would rather buy iPad mini 2 saving 7-8K.
